name: Stackable Runes
description: Adds another variation of runes that can stack together. Transmute a rune in the Cube to convert it between the two variants. Easy upgrade stack of runes. Based on https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/80 and https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/77.
author: olegbl

config.name: Better Rune Visibility
config.description: Enable to use new rune sprites with rune name and number on the picture. Disable to use classic sprites.

config.name: Convert When Destacking
config.description: Enable to have the split off rune automatically convert to a non-stackable variant when splitting a stack. Warning: this adds 15k+ (max stack => 500) cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.

config.name: Recipe to upgrade stack of runes
config.description: Add recipes to upgrade stack of rune. Stack of runes + rune => rune one tier higher. Use with "Convert When Destacking" => checked. Warning: this adds 700+ (every 10 max stack) cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.
